review: The Netflix app will not function. It states that it is installed but when I click on the app it does not work. This is a deal breaker. I should have kept my Roku 3. Finally got Netflix to work.
author: Matthew R. DelRossi

review: So far very happy with it. Great picture quality. Works well with Plex and XBMC. Might not be as customizable as Roku but worlds above my Apple TV (which I only use for HBO Go anymore) in that regards. We'll see how it holds up with use and hope future updates make it better with out messing up previous functionality ( as has happened with Apple TV).
author: Frederick S Rolingher

review: Compared to my Samsung Smart TV, this device has significantly improved my viewing experiences with Netflix, Amazon Prime videos, and YouTube. It is blazing fast and my shows start instantly after I select them. No more waiting in limbo hoping the show will eventually start.The voice command for Amazon videos is impressive and making that feature available for other apps would make the Amazon Fire TV almost perfect. The home screen is designed for Amazon offerings and you have to scroll all the way down to select on "Apps" which takes you to other apps for Netflix,Youtube, etc. It would be less annoying if my top three apps were available at the top of the home screen of if I can simply click on Apps as the second option on the home screen.
author: NYC Joe "NYC Joe"
